page.title: 04POST OFFICE _ LITTLE MILL
page.content: When the shop in the village closed two years ago, the Post Office which I manage became the focal point of local life.Senior Citizens collect weekly pensions and mothers their family allowances from me.Mail for distribution worldwide is posted here. I sell postage stamps,television licence and telephone saving stamps. The Girobank is used by many as a convenient way to pay Rates,Water Rates and various other bills. Withdrawal of money from Giro accounts is especially useful on Saturdays when most banks are closed.Saving schemes of Certificates and Premium Bonds are all available even though the Post Office is small.We sell stationery and confectionery from the shop too so we are a cenrral meeting point in the area.
